resources.string: Welcome to Lost and Found app....
New here? Please Sign Up to find lost belongings
Already have an account? Please Login
The first step is Creating an account. Enter your Name, Email, Password and Contact number and click SIGN UP.\n\nYou can also continue as a guest to see our app.
Now you have to Log in to your account. Enter your Email, Password and click LOGIN.\n\nOnce your email and password is verified, you will be directed to our HOME PAGE.
Now add information to your account, CLICK ON PROFILE or EDIT PROFILE From the MENU\n\nEnter your information and click SAVE CHANGES.

If you forget your password, you can reset, 
Click on Forgot Password? and confirm email. 

You will receive an email with a detailed instruction to reset your password.

Now you are all set to start your search. 
You can POST, CHECK REPORTS and INTERACT WITH POSTS. 

Contact Us if any difficulty faced here.

Thank you so much for being patient and careful enough to check the guidelines. 

Do Share our app with your family and friends. 
Feel free to Rate our app
